original_text:
All the inhabitants of the coastlands
    are appalled at you,
and the hair of their kings bristles with horror;
    their faces are convulsed.
korean_text: 섬의 주민들이 너로 말미암아 놀라고 왕들이 심히 두려워하여 얼굴에 근심이 가득하도다

sentences.original_text: All the inhabitants of the coastlands are appalled at you
sentences.korean_translation: 해안 지역의 모든 주민들이 너를 보고 경악한다.

sentences.original_text: and the hair of their kings bristles with horror
